dict.string:
Place an item from the library on the canvas, then change its properties with the inspector.
[DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(400) DONT_LOCALIZE] Library [DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(101) DONT_LOCALIZE] Canvas [DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(300) DONT_LOCALIZE] Inspector

Assign handlers for events on elements, then author code for the handlers.
[DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(302) DONT_LOCALIZE] Behaviors inspector [DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(102) DONT_LOCALIZE] Source code editor

Provide an identifier and version number for your widget and turn on access to any resources your widget needs.
[DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(200) DONT_LOCALIZE] Attributes

Preview your widget's default image and exclude items on the canvas that have text.
[DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(103) DONT_LOCALIZE] Default image preview [DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(101) DONT_LOCALIZE] Canvas [DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(303) DONT_LOCALIZE] Attributes inspector

Create an icon for your widget by placing art and adjusting the icon's properties in the Fill & Stroke inspector.
[DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(104) DONT_LOCALIZE] Widget icon composer [DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(301) DONT_LOCALIZE] Fill & Stroke inspector

Run your widget to test it and track down problems.
When you're finished with testing, deploy your widget to share it.

image-theme: 0; image-shape: 0; image-opacity: 1.00; image-top-color: 0.6700,0.6700,0.6700; image-bottom-color: 0.6700,0.6700,0.6700; image-border-color: 0.6700,0.6700,0.6700; shadow-include-shadow: 1; shadow-blur: 9.00; shadow-offset: -1.00,-6.00; shadow-color: 0.0000,0.0000,0.0000,0.3333;
